data.addasset:error-toast:description: Check the log for error details
data.addasset:prerequisite-assets:explanation: When prerequisite assets are set, you can access them from the dropdown arrow next to the open button
data.addasset:supported-avatars:explanation-t: Supported avatars can be used to filter the list
data.addasset:category:explanation-text: Only one category can be selected (e.g. outfit, hair, etc.)
data.addasset:tag:explanation-text: Multiple tags can be added (e.g. Vket, free, original, etc.)
data.addasset:memo:explanation-text: Notes can be used for organisation and searching
data.addasset:additional-input:delete-source: Delete the original file after import
data.addasset:select-path: Which would you like to add?
data.addasset:select-path:explanation-text: Please choose whether to add a folder or file!
data.addasset:select-path:drop-text: You can also drag and drop a file or folder onto the window to add it
data.addasset:select-path:zip-text:enabled: ZIP files will be extracted automatically
data.addasset:select-path:zip-text:disabled: ZIP files will not be extracted automatically
data.addasset:booth-input:explanation-text: Enter a BOOTH URL to automatically fill in asset details!
data.addasset:booth-edit:explanation-text: Fetch information from BOOTH to overwrite current info, or move to the next tab
data.addasset:duplicate-warning:explanation-t: Are you trying to add an already registered asset?
data.addasset:duplicate-warning:warning-text: An asset with the same BOOTH URL already exists!
data.addasset:path-confirmation:title: Confirm files/folders to add
data.addasset:path-confirmation:description: Paths to files or folders that do not exist are included. Do you want to continue?
data.addasset:path-confirmation:alert-title: Only existing items will be imported, and non-existing items will be skipped
data.addasset:path-confirmation:skip-items: Items to be skipped as they do not exist
data.addasset:path-confirmation:unable-to-con: No items can be imported, cannot continue
data.assetcard:open-button:show-dependency-wa: You can check prerequisite assets from the downward arrow on the Open button.
data.assetcard:more-button:data-management:ex: You can add or remove data. For advanced operations, please use the Explorer.
You can also add new files or folders by dragging them into the window.
data.assetcard:more-button:delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this asset?
data.assetcard:more-button:delete-confirm:exp: The data will be permanently deleted, and any links to dependent assets will be removed.
data.assetcard:select-unitypackage:select-fil: Which file would you like to use?
data.assetcard:select-unitypackage:always-ope: Always open the management folder and do not show this next time
data.assetview:background:no-results: No assets match the filter criteria
data.mainnavbar:sort-settings:title: Sort by
data.mainnavbar:size-settings:title: Display size
data.resetdialog:reset-confirm: Are you sure you want to reset?
data.resetdialog:reset-confirm:explanation-te: This action cannot be undone, so proceed with caution.
Once deleted, the application will restart automatically.
data.resetdialog:reset-confirm:checkbox-text: I understand that deleted data cannot be restored.
data.loaderror:load-error:description: KonoAsset could not successfully load the data
data.loaderror:load-error:explanation-text: To proceed, you need to repair or initialise the data
data.loaderror:appdata-not-found-text: The path is unknown as the settings file could not be located
data.preference:about:description: An asset management tool for VRChat to make choosing assets easier
data.preference:about:support-text-1: You can support this project by contributing on GitHub
data.preference:about:support-text-2: We do not accept financial support
data.preference:about:support-text-3: KonoAsset finds its purpose through creators making 3D models
data.preference:about:support-text-4: Prioritising support for creators serves as encouragement for us as well
data.preference:adapter:import:description: Select a KonoAsset-compatible dataset to add to the existing data
data.preference:adapter:import:alert:descript: We recommend backing up your data before importing!
data.preference:adapter:import:progress:title: Importing...
data.preference:adapter:export:description: Export asset data in the specified format
data.preference:adapter:export:type:konoasset: For migrating to KonoAsset on another device
Export as an uncompressed ZIP file in the format used by KonoAsset
data.preference:adapter:export:type:avatar-ex: Convert and export in a format that can be read by Avatar Explorer
data.preference:adapter:export:type:human-rea: For displaying files in File Explorer or equivalent.
Organize folder names and other details into an easy-to-understand format and export as a ZIP file
data.preference:adapter:export:progress:title: Exporting...
data.preference:statistics:volume-bar-chart:d: Total disc space used by registered asset files
data.preference:settings:destination-select:e: If you want to change the directory where assets and image data are stored, enter the new location below to proceed with migration
data.preference:settings:destination-select:w: Manual data migration has risks of data corruption
Only do so if you fully understand the data structure
data.preference:settings:progress-bar:title: Migrating data...
data.preference:settings:application-data:exp: Set the directory where assets and images are stored
data.preference:settings:delete-source:explan: If this setting is enabled, the original file/folder will be automatically deleted after importing assets
data.preference:settings:reset:explanation-te: Select and initialise data registered in the application.
data.preference:settings:update-channel:expla: Specify the channel for receiving updates
The Pre-Release channel provides the latest features quickly but is more prone to bugs
data.preference:settings:use-unitypackage-sel: If this setting is enabled, pressing the 'Open' button will select Unitypackage files by default, and if multiple files exist, a selection dialog will appear
data.preference:settings:zip-extraction-toggl: When a ZIP file is selected to be added, it will be automatically extracted
data.top:new-update-toast:description: This update includes bug fixes, new features, and more
data.top:update-dialog:title: Preparing update
data.top:update-dialog:changelog:title: Changelog
data.setup:tab:2:title: Select storage location
data.setup:tab:2:description-1: Choose a directory to store the asset data
data.setup:tab:2:description-2: This directory can be changed later in the settings tab
